1.1.name: wordpress/findboo-video-audio-games-search-widget
1.1.description:
FindBoo provides all in one search , play, listen for videos, music audio, games and software from YouTube, Google Video, Hulu, Truveo, Last.fm, HeyZap and ZoomInfo. At the same time from result pages you can click on search result (in thumbnail view) to either watch the video, listen to music or radio station, play games and meet with people.

With FindBoo Widget Custom Search, easily you can provide the same feature to your website visitors. You can change the setting to display your website logo in search result page and set a URL linkback to your website.
